mapper.insert: insert into book (book_name, total_quantity, loanable_quantity) values (#{bookName}, #{regQuantity}, #{regQuantity})
insert into book_loan_history (history_type, borrower_id, book_id) values (#{historyType}, #{memberId}, #{bookId})
mapper.delete: delete from books_on_loan where member_id = #{memberId} and book_id = #{bookId}
mapper.select: select history_type historyType, m.id id, b.book_name bookName, history_date date from book_loan_history h join member m on h.borrower_id = m.member_id join book b on h.book_id = b.book_id where borrower_id = #{memberId}
